title: HoP 402 - Life is Not Enough - Medicine in Renaissance France
itunes:title: HoP 402 - Life is Not Enough - Medicine in Renaissance France
description: Challenges to Galenic medical orthodoxy from natural philosophy: Jean Fernel with his idea of the human’s “total substance,” and the Paracelsans.
